title: League is so much fun right now, I love the high damage this season.
body: Really love getting 100-0 in UNDER 1 second against a champion with literally 0 counterplay.

replies.body: Everyone is waiting for a good game to come out to qquit league. Sadly its a slow year on video games. Most good one are coming at the end of 2018 to 2019.

> [{quoted}](name=Awhegark,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YEEV0vEk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-19T04:55:56.285+0000)
>
> Everyone is waiting for a good game to come out to qquit league. Sadly its a slow year on video games. Most good one are coming at the end of 2018 to 2019.

Pretty much.
